resources.post: Old Fart Rants isn’t a reliable source of information, I’ve covered that in great detail. ;) Picking on the Shroud of Turin is OFR’s way of trying to seem intelligent on biblical issues. He claimed to have studied the Bible for 50 years but didn’t know the Old Testament was written in Hebrew & Aramaic, NO JOKE!.
